title: Mrs. Harris Goes to Paris
writer: Paul Gallico, Carroll Cartwright, Anthony Fabian
short_cast: Lesley Manville, Isabelle Huppert, Lambert Wilson, Alba Baptista, Lucas Bravo, Jason Isaacs, Ellen Thomas, Rose Williams
cast: Lesley Manville, Isabelle Huppert, Lambert Wilson, Alba Baptista, Lucas Bravo, Jason Isaacs, Ellen Thomas, Rose Williams

desc: Dreaming of buying a Dior gown, an irrepressible London housecleaner brightens the lives of those around her on a life-changing Parisian vacation.
